content.rendered:
Directed by Jamie Crawford. Jamie Crawford.

Cast  Heather Eason Liposky( Self – Woodstock ’99 Concert Goer ) . Colin Speir( Self – Production Team ) . John Scher( Self – Woodstock Promoter ) . Sara( Self – Woodstock ’99 Concert Goer ) . David Blaustein( Self – ABC News Reporter, Woodstock ’99 ) . Pilar Law( Self – Michael Lang’s Assistant ) . Michael Lang( Self – Woodstock Co-Founder ) . Kyle( Self – Stage Security ) . Lee Rosenblatt( Self – Assistant Site Manager ) . Scott Vincent( Self – Videographer ) . Keith( Self – Woodstock ’99 Concert Goer ) . Jonathan Davis( Self – Lead Singer, Korn ) . Susan Spano( Audio Description Narrator ) . Jewel( Self – Singer ) . Lisa Law( Self – Woodstock Photographer ) . Tim Healy( Self – MTV Producer ) . A.J. Srybnik( Self – Rave Production Manager ) . Jeff Rowland( Self – Executive Metropolitan Entertainment ) . Tom( Self – Woodstock ’99 Concert Goer ) . Joe Griffo( Self – Former Mayor, Rome NY ) . Chris( Self – Stage Security ) . Cody( Self – Peace Patrol ) . Peter Katsis( Self – Former Manager, Limp Bizket ) . Aaron Sadovsky( Self – Woodstock, TV Producer ) . Gavin Rossdale( Self – Lead Singer, Bush ) . Joe Patterson( Self – Public Health Inspector ) . Joe Pena( Self – Paramedic ) . Fatboy Slim( Self ) . Dan Gross( Self – Co-Founder, Pax Anti-Gun Violence Charity ) . Dan Flynn( Self – Head of Security Planning )

Language English.

Producers James R.M. Hunt. Cassandra Hamar Thornton. Amani Duncan. Casey Feldman. Sasha Kosmin/epsky. Jack Macinnes. Tom Pearson. William Swann. Tim Wardle.

Production BBH Entertainment. RAW.

Number of Seasons 1

Number of Episodes 3

Status Finished (2022–2022)
